column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Service: Our waitress took a long time to come by to take our drinks
column2: but we overlooked it. When she arrived to take our order
column3: we had already had plenty of time to look at the menu
column4: so we said we were ready to order. I think she took offense to that because she really didn't come by to speak to us for the rest of our meal. Her assistant/runner/busboy was the main one checking in on us and taking our dessert and coffee orders. He was great. But if I'm gonna drop $40 on a tip
column5: I want my server to at least pretend to be interested in me.
